messages: 5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:19): because you're sounding a little like m
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:20): nah, just a little delerious
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:20): okay so ilecs under a certain size get this subsidy?
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:20): for providing lead wire wrapped in paper, from 1946
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:20): with a single point of failure per county?
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:25): J4k3: hmm.  the wisp dood today told me that there are things that can make canopy less predatory, like disabling certain frequencies.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:25): but he said it hops six channels
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:26): yeah, you can get it down to using a normal amount of spectrum
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:26): but... it gets it ass beat by 802.11 at those speeds
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:26): at 20 mhz, I believe so
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:27): so canopy's speed is dependent upon spectrum predation?
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:27): i find it kind of incredible that hparker's whole network got blown off the map by Sprint's canopy omni which was blocks away from it
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:27): but it was for a month
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:28): til he moved to 5.8 GHz, as i recall
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:28): he should fire up some ntsc-fm in their general direction :P
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:28): but wouldn't that indicate that they had an omni with a mega amp on it
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:29): that was just about as loud as could be
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:29): an SA is the only way to know for sure
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:29): i dont think it was even sectorized.  i don't think they had a clue, period.  and they have since eliminated that offering.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:29): Russell, KS was one of their handful of nationwide testbeds apparently and they considered it to be a failure.
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:29): I have an omni, it sucks, I just don't want to spend the money at the moment
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:30): but I suspect I will be doing it anyways
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:30): well you would if you had to.
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:30): the tower in town is sectorized
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:30): but your stuph doesn't suck so you don't have to.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:30): and you have no amps at all, right
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:30): this one is sector'd at 5.8, but omni at 2.4.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:30): i mean no external amps anyway
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:30): I own an rflinx 1w amp, but its been sitting here collecting dust for a year
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:31): kismet says hihi2u a loooongways off
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:31): sitting in the bed of the dodger
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:32): nah, its a dodge, I pee in the gas tank to clean the injectors
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:32): the canopy admin has one of those
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:32): LOOKIE THERE, FLASH!  WE'RE GONNA GIT US SOME WIFI BOYS!  COO COO COO
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:33): THEY GOT ANOTHER TOWER UP.  WAIT'LL BOSS HEARS ABOUT THIS!

5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:34): and that just kinda mentally segues into .... "countywide POTS outages for FIVE DAYS?  MISTER JENKINS, HOW *COULD* YOU?"  "... and i'd have gotten away with it, too!  IF IT WASN'T FOR THEM DANG MEDDLING WISP KIDS!!!!!!...  AND THEIR LITTLE DOG, TOO!"
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:35): THE ILEC CEO WAS THE PHANTOM OF THE TOWER, ALL ALONG!!!
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:37): I should weld the doors, and get a remote to roll the windows down to crawl inside
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:42): ok I gotta boot windows
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:42): I found a bunch of crazy hyundai amateur fucked-up driving videos and I can't view them
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:43): theres an 07 sf 3.3L test drive video.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:49): J4k3: dood.  can't crossover office provide the Flash plugin?
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:50): like it does for Quicktime plugin
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:51): J4k3: i just changed my SSID to be my local phone number, broadcasted, ... and i've had a mac ACL.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:52): if some kid's visiting grandma with their laptop, they can gimme a call.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:52): which will never happen.  i just did it to say i did it.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:52): it might be less astronomically unlikely that some wifi crackpot scans the area with a directional antenna from a mountaintop.
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:53): I've sold a few accounts
addad51e4f5f7e71fec293b40534a2f8 (13:59): the ssid is an ad?
57f6fd9c0e6da61c1f802233d83277fc (14:01): dtm: i have internet explorer 6 with flash 9 in linux. There's a helper to install it :)
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (14:02): that needs to happen to me
57f6fd9c0e6da61c1f802233d83277fc (14:08): related videos: lucky guy, how to buy pizza
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (14:13): if girls had to do that
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (14:13): they couldn't eat too much pizza
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (14:13): else they'd get fat, and no longer get free pizza
